channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How AI Search Is Shaping The Future Of Education And Research
item.description: The transformative power of AI is being felt across industries, and education is no exception. AI search tools are not a passing trend.

item.title: User-Centered Research Methods For Medical Device Design
item.description: In the medical device industry, usability plays a critical role in ensuring the safety and effectiveness of highly complex medical products.
